cost.name: AWS DocumentDB Cost Optimization Best Practices

controls.description: Regularly monitor and adjust DocumentDB instance types based on actual resource utilization

implementation.description: Use CloudWatch metrics to analyze CPU, memory, and I/O utilization and resize instances accordingly
